snippet: Already struggling, Alex Rodriguez went 0 for 3 in Game 3 of the Yankees’ division series and was pulled. But it’s unclear who, or what, can jump-start the offense.
abstract: Bill Pennington On Baseball column suggests that, while New York Yankees benched struggling slugger Alex Rodriguez during Game 3 of AL division series with Baltimore Orioles, Yankees offensive slump goes well beyond Rodriguez.
lead_paragraph: Already struggling, Alex Rodriguez went 0 for 3 in Game 3 of the Yankees’ division series and was pulled. But it’s unclear who, or what, can jump-start the offense.

headline.print_headline: Slumping in Middle of Lineup, Rodriguez Is Center of Attention
headline.seo: Slumping Rodriguez Is Center of Attention in Yankees’ Series vs. Orioles
headline.main: Slumping in Middle of Lineup, Rodriguez Is Center of Attention
